resources.string: Keep track of your deposits,\nsavings and loans
Calculate the interests\nand know the after result
Keep track on your\ndeposit and loan dues
Track the due dates of your most\nimportant financial necessities\nand take benefits

We are working towards moving all customers and products to
the new Bank ME app. Until this happens, our Bank Me app
and Internet Banking will continue to service products such as Online Savings Accounts, Everyday Transaction
 Accounts, personal loans, credit cards and home loans.
